text:
Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra's love story is as good as a Disney fairy tale. The couple who got engaged in India in August is all set to get hitched by the end of this year. In just five months of being together, Nick popped the question to PC with a Tiffany and Co diamond ring and the couple decided to take the plunge.
Agencies
If you are someone who has been jealous of PC and Nick's story, wait till you read this detail. According to a report in TMZ, Nick has purchased a swanky $6.5 million pad in Beverly Hills Post Office, Los Angeles with the sought-after pin code—90210.
Agencies
This mansion will have five bedrooms, four bathrooms, an ungated pool that overlooks the hills and a total area of 4,129 square feet. In case you are wondering how PC and Nick's future home will look like, have a look at the pictures.
Here are the pictures of Nick and PC's new home and they will make you really jealous.
